DataElement.preferredName: Dental  Removable  Retainer Device Component  Lost Occurrence  Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response of Yes or No to the participant's removable retainer becoming misplaced so that the user can no longer wear it.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A removable retainer becoming misplaced so that the user can no longer wear it.

Property.preferredDefinition: Lost; parted with; no longer held or possessed.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
